name: KAIJU ATTACK!
description:
This was the submission to the 2021 Mini Jam 81!! 

THEME: KAIJU

RESTRICTION: DEATH IS NOT THE END!*

Kaiju Attack is a small game where you, the soldier has to defeat the kaiju destroying the city!! But even in the kaiju's death, they will still rain fire and lighting on you*!!!

The controls are simple. Press left and right arrow keys to move side to side.  Hold the Up arrow keys to propel your self, and press C to shoot. Evade the lighting to stay alive*.  Even after killing the kaijus, their powers will still go on, increasing the difficulty as it progresses.*

Will you beat the monsters in their tracks!!??

probably......

*This will hopefully be fixed/implemented in the near future, since the jam only lasted for 72 hours.
